The "Inspiration Hub" - A government system where individuals can share their unique skills and talents to aid in decision-making and problem-solving.
The "Crowdsourced Council" - A government system where citizens are directly involved in the decision-making process through a decentralized platform.
The "Skill-Share Society" - A government system where individuals are rewarded for sharing their skills and talents with the community.
The "Expert Panel" - A government system where a diverse group of experts are appointed to provide guidance and advice on policy issues.
